title: 4 Bedroom House for Sale in Nawala
details:
REF NO: HFS0089

Beautiful 4 Bedroom House for Sale in Nawala

Specifications:

- Unfurnished
- 4 Spacious Bedrooms with Built in wardrobes
- All rooms have provision for a/c
- 4 Bathrooms
- 4000 sqft
- 11 perches
- Architect designed house
- Parking for 2 vehicles
- Roller shutter

Ground Floor:

- Tiled flooring
- Spacious living and Dinning
- Open house concept
- Courtyards available
- Dry and wet kitchen available on the ground floor
- 1 Bedroom on the ground floor (can be used as an office room or driver's quarters) with attached washroom
- Servants room and washroom

1st floor:

- Wooden flooring
- 2 Bedrooms on the 1 st floor with attached washrooms.
- Small pantry and living on the 1 st floor
- Spacious balcony

2nd Floor:

- Wooden Flooring
- Master Bedroom (A/C) with a walk in closet
- Attached washroom

Location:

- 350 meters to the main road
- 5 min walk to Keells Super market
- 2 - 4 min drive to restaurants such as Coco Veranda, Caffe Michelangelo and Rocco's.
- 5 - 9 mins drive to hospitals such as Asiri Surgical, Ninewells, Lanka hospital etc.
- less than a 10 minute drive from British School, Elizabeth Moir Junior and Senior Schools,
CIS and Gateway College and less than 15 minutes drive away from schools in
Bambalapitiya, Kollupitiya and Cinnamon Gardens
- Close to main educational institutions
- Close to medical hub

Price of the property - LKR 65 Million
Price is exclusive of legal fee and stamp duty fee
